attributes.additional_details:
Make it law that all motorised vehicle drivers over the age of 70 have to give up driving. There are numerous accidents caused from the actions of old people who often have not even passed a driving test. This would allow the working public to have more use of the roads for income/earnings which is vital for this countries future.

There is suitable free public transport for those in mature years of life who are often stressed with modern traffic conditions.
